actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the bloodshed must be stopped in Croatia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that bloodshed must be stopped and that: (1) the United Nations should intervene and send peacekeeping forces to Yugoslavia; (2) Yugoslav army forces and Serbian insurgents should pull back to internationally recognized pre-war borders; (3) destruction of cultural artifacts and buildings must cease; (4) attacks on internationally recognized relief workers and their organizations must cease; (5) warring factions must stop summary executions, torture, abuse, and terrorism; (6) an independent authority should investigate allegations of atrocities by warring factions; and (7) warring factions must respect the rights of all ethnic groups and halt the killing of innocent people.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the bloodshed must be stopped in Croatia.
